text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse The Democratic Governors are keeping infection low while GOP states are spreading #coronavirus carelessly. Results will show this fact very soon where all red states will spike faster. Dems are making #potus look good even though there is no leadership in #whitehouse! So sad...
